summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the spiked shield
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=green]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

quick but not so dirty texture rework of the spiked shield.
resolution 4096X2048
to install just drop content of package inside  your data folder or use nexus mod manager.

[youtube]qsm3UA3cRi4[/youtube] [youtube]pdeKz9sah9c[/youtube]

enjoy
author: CaBaL
